Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue  Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at  due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/39th
ShortDescription: Northbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 39th, Laramie, 31st and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/39th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 39th, Laramie, 31st and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/39th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
